headline: Linde (LIN) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Strength And 1% Overvalued Narrative
summary: Linde (LIN) is drawing investor attention after its shares closed at US$508.27, with recent returns of 0.8% over the past day, 4.7% in the past week, and 11.7% over the past month. See our latest analysis for Linde. For context, Linde’s recent momentum has been building, with a 30 day share price return of 11.7% and a 90 day share price return of 24.6%. Its 5 year total shareholder return of 120% highlights how longer term investors have been rewarded. If you are looking beyond industrial...

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Highlights SAP, Linde, Parker-Hannifin, Daily Journal and Espey
summary: SAP, Linde and Parker-Hannifin headline top analyst picks, with microcaps Daily Journal and Espey flashing margin gains and strong backlogs.

headline: Here’s Why Aristotle Growth Equity Fund Sold Linde (LIN)
summary: Aristotle Funds, an investment advisor, released its “Growth Equity Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. U.S. equity markets reached new all-time highs in Q4 2025, with the S&P 500 Index rising 2.66% and the Bloomberg U.S. Aggregate Bond Index increasing by 1.10%.
